scripts.build: cross-env NODE_ENV=production rimraf dist && babel --config-file ../../.babelrc src --out-dir dist --copy-files --no-comments && rimraf dist/**/**/tests
scripts.watch: cross-env NODE_ENV=development && babel --config-file ../../.babelrc src --watch --out-dir dist --copy-files --no-comments && rimraf dist/**/**/tests
